thread.title: Man arrested after burned body found in Long Island woods
thread.title_full: Man arrested after burned body found in Long Island woods - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Man arrested after burned body found in Long Island woods
text:
MANORVILLE, N.Y. (AP) - Police have arrested a man on a murder charge in the death of another man whose body was found burning in a wooded area on Long Island.
Suffolk County police say 21-year-old Bryan RosalesMejia, Amityville, was arraigned Sunday morning. He's charged with murdering 36-year-old German Guzman, of Amityville. Information on his lawyer was not immediately available.
Guzman's charred remains were found Thursday after a motorist traveling down Wading River Manor Road notified police of a fire in the Otis Pike Preserve.
